summary: The diff implements nearly all requirements comprehensively. All 13 REQs are addressed with matching components. Minor gaps exist: the navbar 'Insights' link maps to '#positioning' while the section uses id='positioning' not id='insights'. Internet Identity authentication is included despite the spec explicitly listing no authentication as a non-goal. A caffeine.ai attribution link is added to the footer without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: REQ-2: Navbar 'Insights' link should scroll to a section identifiable as Insights â€” the spec lists 7 nav links including 'Insights' each scrolling to their respective sections
missing_requirements.reason: The navbar maps 'Insights' to href='#positioning' and the App.tsx section uses id='positioning', not id='insights'. While it navigates somewhere, there is no section with id='insights' as would be expected from the spec's nav structure.

hallucinated_features.description: caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking parameters added to the footer bottom bar
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any caffeine.ai attribution or third-party attribution links anywhere in the footer spec. This was added without being requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider and related hooks (useInternetIdentity, useActor) included and wrapping the entire app
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'No authentication or user accounts' as a non-goal. Despite this, InternetIdentityProvider wraps the entire app in main.tsx and full authentication hook infrastructure is present.
